title: S3 Ep18: S3, The State v. Dennis Perry - Addendum 10 – Dixie Mafia
itunes:title: S3, The State v. Dennis Perry - Addendum 10 – Dixie Mafia
description:
September 13, 2018 / Jon Cryer, Colin Miller, and guest Celeste Trusty discuss Episode 10 of the Dennis Perry series and criminal justice issues in Philadelphia.

Episode scoring music by Animal Weapon and Blue Dot Sessions.

Today’s Addendum is sponsored by VistaPrint, Squarespace and Blue Apron.
